name: Ninja Frog Platformer
description:
Are you looking for the best 2D platformer game? Then don’t miss out Ninja Platformer!

Game Engine: Construct 2

Developer:  Shubham Dhamankarr

Game art:  Pixel Frog

KEY FEATURES:
Classic 2D platformer
Totaly free of cost
Run-on any device
Easy to play

HOW TO PLAY?
1. Press the Left, Right and Jump button to move Ninja Frog Left, Right and Jump.
2. Jump on the enemy to kill them.
3. Eat Apple to increase your Score.
